page.title: 1480 YEARS OF MONYASH
page.content:
Mrs Belfield has lived here in Monyash all her life ( about 80 years) but not in the same house.
She went to school here and played hopscotch on the road because there weren't any cars in her days.
Every year the Methodist Chapel had an anniversary celebration.Everybody walked around the village singing songs and afterwards they had a picnic. She says that Monyash isn't as good as it was when she was little.
She likes Monyash and says it is a very pretty village.Out of every thing in the village she likes the village square best.She doesn't mind tourists in the village.
